name: Trubo Tank Redux DX
description:
Description

TurboTank Redux DX is a Drive & Shoot game inspired by the classic NES graphic and sound style as well as games oriented to speedrunners.

Explore the deep cave with your super equiped Turbo Tank and battle guarding robots, turrets and miners to get to the mystical Rainbow Gem!

Items and power ups

Acquire the 5 level keys to gain access to all the rooms. Drive and shoot, drive and shoot!

Pick up ammo and speed boosters to clear out your path to the biggest treasure known to mankind.

How to play?

The game runs under Windows Operating System.

It is preferable to use a gamepad, but you can also play with a keyboard.

Remember to...

Upload your best time in the comments and give feedback. Your opinions are very important to me so I can get better at making games and learn more each day!

Credits

The amazing soundtrack was created by:

Luismi Mumu Island Music

Eric Skiff

Did you know?

Turbo Tank Redux DX was created as a demo for a GameMaker: Studio workshop at ITESM in Puebla, Mexico.
